data.title: Karmann Colorado VW T4 2.5 Winterised Motorhome - EAST SUSSEX for Sale in Horam, East Sussex Classified
data.meta_description: for sale, Karmann Colorado H - VW T4 102bhp 5 cyl. 5 speed with Cruise Control. Excellent . GreatBritainListed.com has classifieds in Horam, East Sussex for new and used Trailers and Mobile homes.
data.text: Karmann Colorado H - VW T4 102bhp 5 cyl. 5 speed with Cruise Control. Excellent condition Inside and out - must be seen!, 4 berth, 4 seat belts, 2 previous owners (non smokers and no pets). Road Tax End Oct/ New MOT. Winterised 4 berth German motorhome - Left Hand Drive. 76500 KM, 45,000 Miles Length 5.98M including bike rack, Width 2.1M, Height 2.8M, GRP and Aluminium construction. Aircon and electric windows in front cab, Reversing camera, CD player, Captain Seats, New Engine battery fitted Feb 10 Bosch Silver HSB096 (5 year guarantee ), Alarmed throughout with extra door security locks fitted, Karmann Specification with extras: - 2 roof lights - 1 being an extra Large HEKI - U Shape Lounge - Table is on Swivelling pillar that drops to make bed in seconds - Fitted carpets to lounge - Windows (one hand opening) - double glazed fitted with fly screens and blinds - Fiamma Bike rack - Thetford Swivel Cassette flushing toilet C200 - Payload 900KG - Truma C-3402 combined water/space heating - Gas blown heating - 2 x 7KG cylinders in outside locker - Gaslow hose and 300 regulator fitted - 2 x Elecsol 100Amp Leisure batteries - Lighting, 4 x LED spotlights to rear lounge, 4 x Fluorescent fittings - Outside LED strip light - 81 litre electric/ gas fridge - Electrolux - 90 litre fresh water tank/ 70 litre waste tank - Solar Panel - Mini Safe - Exterior Gas outlet socket - Roof bars fitted for roof box. Roll out awning. Exterior ladder Phone Number: 1 or
